title: Oracle

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, select a letter, number or symbol. Every role starting with that character gains Powerful defense for the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot select the same character twice in a row.
- You can only protect the letter O once.
- You will know if you saved someone from an attack, but not how many people.

desc:
Post 5138
*Edited from BToS2. The Ianist synergy is real.*
